snippet: The company will now require some 5,000 direct suppliers in more than 70 countries to provide data, including the source of their harvested wood fiber.
abstract: 3M is implementing new practices to make sure its 5,000 paper, pulp and packaging suppliers in more than 70 countries provide materials that come from sustainably logged timber.
lead_paragraph: The company will now require some 5,000 direct suppliers in more than 70 countries to provide data, including the source of their harvested wood fiber.

headline.print_headline: 3M Moves Toward Using Sustainably Logged Timber
headline.main: 3M Moves Toward Using Sustainably Logged Timber
